Summary: There were tons of blinking lights of white and red all over the western sky for an hour.
divs: Sighting DetailsmY GIRLFRIEND WAS DRIVING DOWN bUTTLES ROAD IN LEWISTON WHEN SHE SPOTTED TONS OF LIGHTS GOING OFF IN THE SKY RANDOMLY IN WHITE AND RED COLOR, SHE CAME HOME AND PICK ME UP AND DROVE TO THE SAME SPOT I SEEN IT, THERE HAD TO BE AT LEAST 10 TO 12 OR MORE LIGHTS BLINKING RANDOMLY, I DID NOT HEAR ANY ENGINES OR ANTYHING ELSE, SO WE WATCHED FOR A COUPLE MINUTES AND LEFT THIS STATRED HAPPENING AROUND 7 PM ISH WE CAME HOME, I TOOK OFF TO CHECK IT OUT AGAIN, AS I WAS DRIVING DOWN THE ROAD FROM MY HOME I STARTED SEING THE LIGTHS FLASHING ALL OVER BLINKING SIMUTALSLYIN ALL OVER AS I PULLED IN TO SIDE OF THE ROAD I SAW THESE HUGE BRIGHT YELLOWISH LIGHTS APPEAR FROM NOWHERE 3 THEN REPETELY SAW 3 TO 8 OR 9 AT TIME SOME MOVED COUNTER CLOCKWISE AND SOME ONE APEERED AND THE OTHER DISAPERD WITHIN SECONDS AS NOW I DROVE ACROSS THE STREET TO GLENS MARKET PARKINGI TO GET SOME ONE ELSE TO SEE THE LIGHTS ONE PERSON CAME AND OTHERS SEEN IT TO TO MY KNOWLDEGE 5 PEPLE SAW TH LIGTHS ARE MORE, THE DID NOT LOOK LIKE FLARIS THEY WERE EVERYWHERE I WAS SHOCKED, I SAW WEIRED THEING IN THE SKY BUT NOTING QUIT LIKE THIS, FINALLY I CALLED MY GIRLFRENDS MOM AND SISTER TO SEE THIS NOW ITS AROUND 8 PM THEY BOTH SAW ONE TO TWO OF THE BRIGHT YELLOW LIGHTS WITH THE BLINKING RED AND MOSLTEY WHTIE LIGTHS GOING OFF INT HE SKY, THEN ABOUT 8 TO 10 MINS IT STOPPED I LOOKED TO SEE ANY JET LEAVEING AFTER WORDS I COULDNT SEE ANDYTHIN THE LIGTHS WERE MOVING SO FAST IT COULDENT BE A JET OR NORMAL AIRCRAFTT THANK YOU
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Albert
There were no other sightings in Albert on or around October 25th 2010
